name: SurfaceModelOptions
description: Defines options for the SurfaceModel component.

inputParameters.name: sheeting_outside
inputParameters.description: (optional) Thickness of sheeting on the side of assembly closest to input surface. If zero, no sheeting will be added.

inputParameters.name: sheeting_inside
inputParameters.description: (optional) Thickness of sheeting on the side of assembly furthest from input surface. If zero, no sheeting will be added.

inputParameters.name: lintel_posts
inputParameters.description: (optional) If False, jack studs will not be generated and headers will butt directly onto king studs.

inputParameters.name: edge_stud_offset
inputParameters.description: (optional) Distance to offset the studs at the edge of the assembly. If zero, the studs will be flush with the edge of the assembly.

inputParameters.name: custom_dimensions
inputParameters.description: (optional) From beam dimension component. Beam dimensions must either be defined here or in with beam_width and frame_depth inputs.

inputParameters.name: joint_overrides
inputParameters.description: (optional) From joint override component. overrides default joint types between beam categories.
